ygData.subject: Re: Where o' where is Lesser Shielding spell???
ygData.msgSnippet: You can alo get all the shielding spells and BIND affinity at the wizard s guild in Akkanon, there is one merchant in there that regards you indifferently, so
ygData.messageBody:
You can alo get all the shielding spells and BIND affinity at the wizard's
guild in Akkanon, there is one merchant in there that regards you
indifferently, so it helps. You are not KOS in wizard's guild as a gnome.

----- Original Message -----
From: talonz <talonz@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 9:43 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Where o' where is Lesser Shielding spell???


> From: "talonz" <talonz@...>
>
> I bought it in the Necro Guild in Ak'anon, as sonn as you enter the
> mines take the first left and then another left and there is a
> merchant that sells some spells(lesser sheilding beng one of them)
>
> -Talonz
> > From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
> >
> > I bought it in the Mage/Wizard guild in Neriak Commons..
> >
